jodd.mail

Class EmailAttachmentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.mail.EmailAttachmentBuilder

  • public class EmailAttachmentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for convenient EmailAttachment creation.
